div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا ما اشترى يحنّس بن شنوده بن بطاقس من مقطلنى ابنت شنوده
بن أيّوب وهما جميعا من سكّان ططون من كورة الفيّوم حصّتها
من المنزل المشاع بينها وبينه وهو السّدس منها اربع أسهم
من أربع وعشرين سهما بحدّه وحدوده ومدخله ومخرجه وسفله
وعلوه داخل فيه وخارج منه حدّه القبلي منزل قفرى القمبشاوي
وحدّه البحري طريق المارّة وحدّه الشّرقي منزل جرمنه حرمنه ابنت تميسة تمينة
وحدّه الغربي عرصة لورثة بني إبشايه اشترى ذلك منها بدينار
واحد عينا ذهبا وازن بالجديد من العين المعسولة المغسولة قد قبضت
مقطلنى هذا الثّمن تامّا وافيا وتبرت من هذه الحصّة وسلّمت
ذلك إلى يحنّس بن شنوده وحازه وملكه وصار ذلك مال من ماله
وملك من ملكه إن شا باع وإن شا بنا وإن شا سكن ليس لمقطلنى
ابنت شنوده في هذا المنزل بعد هذا الكتاب دعوى ولا طلبة
بوجه من الوجوه ولا سبب من الأسباب باعت ذلك على شرط
بيع الإسلام وعهدته فما كان من علقة أو اتّباعة أو طارئ
بدين أو مستحق بميراث فإنفاذ فإنفاذ فانفاذ ذلك وخلاصه على مقطلنى
ابنت شنوده بالغ ما بلغ من خالص مالها شهد على إقرار
مقطلنى ابنت شنوده بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب بعد أن قرئ
عليها وعرفته وأقرّت بفهمها في صحّة من عقلها وبدنها وجواز
أمرها طائعة غير مكرهة ولا مجبرة طالبة راغبة وذلك في المحرّم
لسنة إحدى وأربعين وثلثمائة شهد على ذلك
شهد عبد الصّمد بن يوسف بن هرون على إقرار مقطلنى ابنت شنوده
بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب شهادته بخطّه وذلك في تأريخه
شهد اليسع إليشع بن عمر بن موسى على إقرار مقطلنى ابنت شنوده ببيع حصّتها
من المنزل الموصوف في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā mā ĭštarà yuḥannisu bnu šanūdaha bni baṭāqusa min maqṭalinà ĭbnati šanūdaha
bni ʾayyūba wa humā ǧamīʿ:an min sukkāni ṭuṭūna min kūraẗi ăl fayyūmi ḥiṣṣata hā
mina ăl manzili ăl mušāʿi bayna hā wa bayna hu wa huwa ăs sudsu min hā ʾarbaʿu ʾashum:in
min ʾarbaʿ:in wa ʿišrīna sahm:an bi ḥaddi hi wa ḥudūdi hi wa madḫali hi wa maḫraǧi hi wa sufli hi
wa ʿulwi hi dāḫil fī hi wa ḫāriǧ min hu ḥaddu hu ăl qibliyyu manzilu qufrà ăl qambašāwiyyi
wa ḥaddu hu ăl baḥriyyu ṭarīqu ăl mārraẗi wa ḥaddu hu ăš šarqiyyu manzilu ǧirmanaha ḥirminaha ĭbnati tamīsaẗa tamīnaẗa
wa ḥaddu hu ăl ġarbiyyu ʿarṣaẗ:un li waraṯaẗi banī ʾibšāyaha ĭštarà ḏālika min hā bi dīnār:in
wāḥid:in ʿayn:an ḏahab:an wāzin:in bi ăl ǧadīdi mina ăl ʿayni ăl maġsūlaẗi maʿsūlaẗi qad qabaḍat
maqṭalinà hāḏā ăṯ ṯamana tāmm:an wāfiy:an wa tabarrat min hāḏihi ăl ḥiṣṣaẗi wa sallamat
ḏālika ʾilà yuḥannisi bni šanūdaha wa ḥāza hu wa malaka hu wa ṣāra ḏālika māl min māli hi
wa milk min milki hi ʾin šāʾa bāʿa wa ʾin šāʾa banā wa ʾin šāʾa sakana laysa li maqṭalinà
ĭbnati šanūdaha fī hāḏā ăl manzili baʿda hāḏā ăl kitābi daʿw:an wa lā ṭalibaẗ:un
bi waǧh:in mina ăl wuǧūhi wa lā sabab:in mina ăl ʾasbābi bāʿat ḏālika ʿalà šarṭi
bayʿi ăl ʾislāmi wa ʿuhdati hi fa mā kāna min ʿulqaẗ:in ʾawi ĭttibāʿaẗ:in ʾaw ṭāriʾ:in
bi dayn:in ʾaw mustaḥiqq:in bi mīrāṯ:in fa fā ʾinfāḏu ʾinqāḏu nafāḏu ḏālika wa ḫalāṣu hu ʿalà maqṭalinà
ĭbnati šanūdaha bāliġ:un mā balaġa min ḫāliṣi māli hā šahida ʿalà ʾiqrāri
maqṭalinà ĭbnati šanūdaha bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi baʿda ʾan quriʾa
ʿalay hā wa ʿarafat hu wa ʾaqarrat bi fahmi hā fī ṣiḥḥaẗ:in min ʿaqli hā wa badani hā wa ǧawāzi
ʾamri hā ṭāʾiʿaẗ:an ġayra mukrahaẗ:in wa lā muǧbaraẗ:in ṭālibaẗ:an rāġibaẗ:an wa ḏālika fī ăl muḥarrami
li sanaẗi ʾiḥdà wa ʾarbaʿīna wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in šahida ʿalà ḏālika
šahida ʿabdu ăṣ ṣamadi bnu yūsufa bni hārūna ʿalà ʾiqrāri maqṭalinà ĭbnati šanūdaha
bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi wa ḏālika fī taʾrīḫi hi
šahida ăl ø ʾilīšaʿu yasaʿu bnu ʿumara bni mūsà ʿalà ʾiqrāri maqṭalinà ĭbnati šanūdaha bi bayʿi ḥiṣṣati hā
mina ăl manzili ăl mawṣūfi fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
This is what Yoḥannes b. Šanûda b. Paṭâqos has bought from Maqṭalenâ, daughter of Šanûda
b. Ayyûb, who both (jointly) are numbered among the inhabitants of Ṭuṭûn of the district of al-Fayyûm: (he has bought) her share
of the dwelling house, shared in common between her and him, this being the sixth of it, four shares
of twenty four shares, to its limit and its boundaries, with its entrance and its exit, and (including) what is below
and above the surface, what is within and what is without; its southern boundary is (formed by) the dwelling house of Qufrâ, originating from Qambašâ,
and its northern boundary is (formed by) the main thoroughfare, and its eastern boundary is (formed by) the dwelling house of Germana, daughter of Tamise(?),
and its western boundary is (formed by) the open area belonging to the heirs of the sons of Ibšâye. He has bought this from her for one
dînâr, gold-coin, full weight according to the new (standard) and washed; Maqṭalenâ has already received dînâr, gold-coin, full weight according to the new (standard), (this sum) having been counted out (to her) in (current) gold-coin; Maqṭalenâ has already received
this price fully (and) entirely, and has released herself of this share and has handed
it over to Yoḥannes b. Šanûda who has acquired and taken possession of it and it has become his own property
and possession, (so that) if he will, he may sell it, and if he will, he may build (on it), and if he will, he may dwell in (it). Maqṭalenâ,
daughter of Šanûda, has no claim and no pretentions respecting this dwelling house after (the completion of) this contract,
from any cause or reason whatever. She has sold this according to
Islamic law of sale and covenant; but if there should be any contention or vindication, or if someone should suddenly appear
with a debt, or should make a claim on the basis of any inheritance, then the recuperation and indemnification therefor are incumbent upon Maqṭalenâ,
daughter of Šanûda, whatever it might amount to, out of her own means. (The following witnesses) have testified to the acknowledgment
by Maqṭalenâ, daughter of Šanûda, respecting all that (is contained) in this contract, after that it had been read
to her and she had taken cognizance of it and acknowledged that she has understood it, she being in a state of sound mind and body, and capable of
transacting her business, voluntarily, without compulsion and not against her will, (but) demanding (and) desiring (it), and this in Muḥarram
of the year three hundred and forty one. There have testified to it:
ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. Yûsuf b. Hârûn is witness to the acknowledgment by Maqṭalenâ, daughter of Šanûda,
respecting all that (is contained) in this act, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting and this on the date.
Al-Yasaʿ b. ʿUmar b. Mûsâ is witness to the acknowledgment by Maqṭalenâ, daughter of Šanûda, respecting the sale of her share
of the dwelling house described in this act, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting.
